review: Excellent product and Excellent value for the buck.
author: bigsteel

review: Chromcast does not work if your router is more then 20 feet away, which is very inconvenient.My router is on the second floor, TV on the first floor.I had to return it.
author: Florin Sgondea

review: Love bringing this everywhere and forcing people to watch what I like!
author: SARAH THERIAULT

review: If anyone is a non-tekkie type person (like me) - relax. Google holds your hand through the entire set up process, which is quick and easy I LOVE this device.
author: Elle Zee

review: When used together with my Synology NAS (DS212J) I get awesome streaming videos and movies that don't take up resources on my mobile device. Now I can watch all my downloaded and saved media on my big-screen TV!
author: Muhammad Nazir
